title: sa_śaṃkara-saundaryalaharī
body:
<body xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'>

<lg xml:id='Saul_1'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na ced evaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditum api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atas tvām ārādhyāṃ hariharavirañcyādibhir api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_1'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śivaḥ śaktyā yukto yadi bhavati śaktaḥ prabhavituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>na ced evaṃ devo na khalu kuśalaḥ spanditum api</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>atas tvām ārādhyāṃ hariharavirañcyādibhir api</seg> <seg type='pāda'>praṇantuṃ stotuṃ vā katham akṛtapuṇyaḥ prabhavati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_2'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanīyāṃsaṃ pāṃsuṃ tava caraṇapaṅkeruhabhavaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>virañciḥ saṃcinvan viracayati lokān avikalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahaty enaṃ śauriḥ katham api sahasreṇa śirasāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haraḥ saṃkṣubhyainaṃ bhajati bhasitoddhūlanavidhim</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_2'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tanīyāṃsaṃ pāṃsuṃ tava caraṇapaṅkeruhabhavaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>virañciḥ saṃcinvan viracayati lokān avikalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vahaty enaṃ śauriḥ katham api sahasreṇa śirasāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>haraḥ saṃkṣubhyainaṃ bhajati bhasitoddhūlanavidhim</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_3'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>avidyānām antastimiramihiradvīpanagarī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>jaḍānāṃ caitanyastabakamakarandasrutijharī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>daridrāṇāṃ cintāmaṇiguṇanikā janmajaladhau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimagnānāṃ daṃṣṭrā muraripuvarāhasya bhavatī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_3'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>avidyānām antastimiramihiradvīpanagarī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>jaḍānāṃ caitanyastabakamakarandasrutijharī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>daridrāṇāṃ cintāmaṇiguṇanikā janmajaladhau</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nimagnānāṃ daṃṣṭrā muraripuvarāhasya bhavatī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_4'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadanyaḥ pāṇibhyām abhayavarado daivatagaṇas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam ekā naivāsi prakaṭitavarābhītyabhinayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhayāt trātuṃ dātuṃ phalam api ca vāñchāsamadhikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śaraṇye lokānāṃ tava hi caraṇāv eva nipuṇau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_4'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvadanyaḥ pāṇibhyām abhayavarado daivatagaṇas</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tvam ekā naivāsi prakaṭitavarābhītyabhinayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>bhayāt trātuṃ dātuṃ phalam api ca vāñchāsamadhikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śaraṇye lokānāṃ tava hi caraṇāv eva nipuṇau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_5'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>haris tvām ārādhya praṇatajanasaubhāgyajananīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purā nārī bhūtvā puraripum api kṣobham anayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>smaro 'pi tvāṃ natvā ratinayanalehyena vapuṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>munīnām apy antaḥ prabhavati hi mohāya mahatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_5'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>haris tvām ārādhya praṇatajanasaubhāgyajananīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>purā nārī bhūtvā puraripum api kṣobham anayat</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>smaro 'pi tvāṃ natvā ratinayanalehyena vapuṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>munīnām apy antaḥ prabhavati hi mohāya mahatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_6'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhanuḥ pauṣpaṃ maurvī madhukaramayī pañca viśikhā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vasantaḥ sāmanto malayamarudāyodhanarathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathāpy ekaḥ sarvaṃ himagirisute kām api kṛpāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apāṅgāt te labdhvā jagad idam anaṅgo vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_6'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dhanuḥ pauṣpaṃ maurvī madhukaramayī pañca viśikhā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vasantaḥ sāmanto malayamarudāyodhanarathaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tathāpy ekaḥ sarvaṃ himagirisute kām api kṛpāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>apāṅgāt te labdhvā jagad idam anaṅgo vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_7'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kvaṇatkāñcīdāmā karikalabhakumbhastanabharā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parikṣīṇā madhye pariṇataśaraccandravadanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanur bāṇān pāśaṃ sṛṇim api dadhānā karatalaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>purastād āstāṃ naḥ puramathitur āhopuruṣikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_7'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kvaṇatkāñcīdāmā karikalabhakumbhastanabharā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>parikṣīṇā madhye pariṇataśaraccandravadanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dhanur bāṇān pāśaṃ sṛṇim api dadhānā karatalaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>purastād āstāṃ naḥ puramathitur āhopuruṣikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_8'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sudhāsindhor madhye suraviṭapivāṭīparivṛte</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>maṇidvīpe nīpopavanavati cintāmaṇigṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>śivākāre mañce paramaśivaparyaṅkanilayāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhajanti tvāṃ dhanyāḥ kati cana cidānandalaharīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_8'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sudhāsindhor madhye suraviṭapivāṭīparivṛte</seg> <seg type='pāda'>maṇidvīpe nīpopavanavati cintāmaṇigṛhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śivākāre mañce paramaśivaparyaṅkanilayāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhajanti tvāṃ dhanyāḥ kati cana cidānandalaharīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_9'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mahīṃ mūlādhāre kam api maṇipūre hutavahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitaṃ svādhiṣṭhāne hṛdi marutam ākāśam upari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mano 'pi bhrūmadhye sakalam api bhittvā kulapathaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahasrāre padme saha rahasi patyā viharasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_9'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mahīṃ mūlādhāre kam api maṇipūre hutavahaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sthitaṃ svādhiṣṭhāne hṛdi marutam ākāśam upari</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mano 'pi bhrūmadhye sakalam api bhittvā kulapathaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sahasrāre padme saha rahasi patyā viharasi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_10'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sudhādhārāsāraiś caraṇayugalāntarvigalitaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prapañcaṃ siñcantī punar api rasaāmnāyamahasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avāpya svāṃ bhūmiṃ bhujaganibham adhyuṣṭavalayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā svapiṣi kulakuṇḍe kuhariṇi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_10'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sudhādhārāsāraiś caraṇayugalāntarvigalitaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>prapañcaṃ siñcantī punar api rasaāmnāyamahasā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>avāpya svāṃ bhūmiṃ bhujaganibham adhyuṣṭavalayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>svam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā svapiṣi kulakuṇḍe kuhariṇi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_11'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>caturbhiḥ śrīkaṇṭhaiḥ śivayuvatibhiḥ pañcabhir api</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>prabhinnābhiḥ śaṃbhor navabhir iti mūlaprakṛtibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>trayaś catvāriṃśad vasudalakalāśratrivalaya</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>trirekhābhiḥ sārdhaṃ tava caraṇakoṇāḥ pariṇatāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_11'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>caturbhiḥ śrīkaṇṭhaiḥ śivayuvatibhiḥ pañcabhir api</seg> <seg type='pāda'>prabhinnābhiḥ śaṃbhor navabhir iti mūlaprakṛtibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>trayaś catvāriṃśad vasudalakalāśratrivalaya</seg><seg type='pāda'>trirekhābhiḥ sārdhaṃ tava caraṇakoṇāḥ pariṇatāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_12'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvadīyaṃ saundaryaṃ tuhinagirikanye tulayituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kavīndrāḥ kalpante katham api viriñciprabhṛtayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad ālokyautsukyād amaralalanā yānti manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tapobhir duṣprāpām api giriśasāyujyapadavīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_12'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvadīyaṃ saundaryaṃ tuhina-giri-kanye tulayituṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kavi-indrāḥ kalpante katham api viriñci-prabhṛtayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad ālokyautsukyād amaralalanā yānti manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tapobhir duṣ-prāpām api giriśasāyujyapadavīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_13'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>naraṃ varṣīyāṃsaṃ nayanavirasaṃ narmasu jaḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tavāpāṅgāloke patitam anudhāvanti śataśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>galadveṇībandhāḥ kucakalaśavisrastasicayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>haṭhāt truṭyatkāñcyo vigalitadukūlā yuvatayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_13'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>naraṃ varṣīyāṃsaṃ nayana-vi-rasaṃ narmasu jaḍaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tavāpāṅga-āloke patitam anudhāvanti śataśaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>galad-veṇī-bandhāḥ kuca-kalaśa-visrasta-sicayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>haṭhāt truṭyat-kāñcyo vigalita-dukūlā yuvatayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_14'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kṣitau ṣatpañcāśad dvisamadhikapañcāśad udake</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hutāśe dvāṣaṣṭiś caturadhikapañcāśad anile</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>divi dviḥṣattriṃśan manasi ca catuḥṣaṣṭir iti ye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mayūkhās teṣām apy upari tava pādāmbujayugam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_14'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kṣitau ṣat-pañcāśad dvi-sam-adhika-pañcāśad udake</seg> <seg type='pāda'>huta-āśe dvā-ṣaṣṭiś catur-adhika-pañcāśad anile</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>divi dviḥ-ṣat-triṃśan manasi ca catuḥ-ṣaṣṭir iti ye</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mayūkhās teṣām apy upari tava pādāmbu-ja-yugam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_15'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarajjyotsnāśubhrāṃ śaśiyutajaṭājūṭamukuṭāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>varatrāsatrāṇasphaṭikaguṭikāpustakakarām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sakṛn na tvā natvā katham iva stāṃ saṃnidadhate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>madhukṣīradrākṣāmadhurimadhurīṇā bhaṇitayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_15'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śaraj-jyotsnā-śubhrāṃ śaśi-yuta-jaṭā-jūṭa-mukuṭāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vara-trāsa-trāṇa-sphaṭika-guṭikā-pustaka-karām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sakṛn na tvā natvā katham iva stāṃ saṃnidadhate</seg> <seg type='pāda'>madhu-kṣīra-drākṣā-madhurima-dhurīṇā bhaṇitayaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_16'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kavīndrāṇāṃ cetaḥkamalavanabālātaparuciṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhajante ye santaḥ kati cid aruṇām eva bhavatīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>virañcipreyasyās taruṇataraśṛṅgāralaharī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>gabhīrābhir vāgbhir vidadhati satāṃ rañjanam amī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_16'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kavi-indrāṇāṃ cetaḥ-kamala-vana-bāla-ātapa-ruciṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhajante ye santaḥ kati cid aruṇām eva bhavatīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>virañci-preyasyās taruṇatara-śṛṅgāra-laharī</seg><seg type='pāda'>-gabhīrābhir vāgbhir vidadhati satāṃ rañjanam amī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_17'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>savitrībhir vācāṃ śaśimaṇiśilābhaṅgarucibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vaśinyādyābhis tvāṃ saha janani saṃcintayati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa kartā kāvyānāṃ bhavati mahatāṃ bhaṅgisubhagair</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vacobhir vāgdevīvadanakamalāmodamadhuraiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_17'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>savitrībhir vācāṃ śaśi-maṇi-śilā-bhaṅga-rucibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vaśiny-ādyābhis tvāṃ saha janani saṃcintayati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sa kartā kāvyānāṃ bhavati mahatāṃ bhaṅgi-su-bhagair</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vacobhir vāg-devī-vadana-kamala-āmoda-madhuraiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_18'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tanucchāyābhis te taruṇataraṇiśrīsaraṇibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>divaṃ sarvām urvīm aruṇimanigmagnāṃ smarati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhavanty asya trasyadvanahariṇaśālīnanayanāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sahorvaśyā vaśyāḥ katikati na gīrvāṇagaṇikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_18'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tanu-cchāyābhis te taruṇa-taraṇi-śrī-saraṇibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda'>divaṃ sarvām urvīm aruṇima-nigmagnāṃ smarati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>bhavanty asya trasyad-vana-hariṇa-śālīna-nayanāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>saha urvaśyā vaśyāḥ kati-kati na gīrvāṇa-gaṇikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_19'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mukhaṃ binduṃ kṛtvā kucayugam adhas tasya tadadho</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>harārdhaṃ dhyāyed yo haramahiṣi te manmathakalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa sadyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ nayati vanitā ity atilaghu</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trilokīm apy āśu bhramayati ravīndustanayugām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_19'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mukhaṃ binduṃ kṛtvā kuca-yugam adhas tasya tad-adho</seg> <seg type='pāda'>ha-rārdhaṃ dhyāyed yo hara-mahiṣi te manmatha-kalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sa sadyaḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ nayati vanitā ity ati-laghu</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tri-lokīm apy āśu bhramayati ravi-indu-stana-yugām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_20'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kirantīm aṅgebhyaḥ kiraṇanikurambāmṛtarasaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hṛdi tvām ādhatte himakaraśilāmūrtim iva yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa sarpāṇāṃ darpaṃ śamayati śakuntādhipa iva</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jvarapluṣṭān dṛṣṭyā sukhayati sudhādhārasirayā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_20'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kirantīm aṅgebhyaḥ kiraṇa-nikurambā-mṛta-rasaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>hṛdi tvām ādhatte hima-kara-śilā-mūrtim iva yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sa sarpāṇāṃ darpaṃ śamayati śakuntādhipa iva</seg> <seg type='pāda'>jvara-pluṣṭān dṛṣṭyā sukhayati sudhā-dhāra-sirayā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_21'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taḍillekhātanvīṃ tapanaśaśivaiśvānaramayīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy upari kamalānāṃ tava kalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahāpadmāṭavyāṃ mṛditamalamāyena manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāntaḥ paśyanto dadhati paramāhlādalaharīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_21'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>taḍil-lekhā-tanvīṃ tapana-śaśi-vaiśvānaramayīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>niṣaṇṇāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy upari kamalānāṃ tava kalām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mahā-padmāṭavyāṃ mṛdita-mala-māyena manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mahāntaḥ paśyanto dadhati parama-āhlāda-laharīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_22'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhavāni tvaṃ dāse mayi vitara dṛṣṭiṃ sakaruṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>iti stotuṃ vāñchan kathayati bhavāni tvam iti yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tadaiva tvaṃ tasmai diśasi nijasāyujyapadavīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mukundabrahmendrasphuṭamukuṭanīrājitapadām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_22'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>bhavāni tvaṃ dāse mayi vitara dṛṣṭiṃ sa-karuṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>iti stotuṃ vāñchan kathayati bhavāni tvam iti yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tada aiva tvaṃ tasmai diśasi nija-sāyujya-padavīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mukunda-brahma-indra-sphuṭa-mukuṭa-nīrājita-padām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_23'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tvayā hṛtvā vāmaṃ vapur aparitṛptena manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śarīrārdhaṃ śaṃbhor aparam api śaṅke hṛtam abhūt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hi tvadrūpaṃ sakalam aruṇābhaṃ trinayanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kucābhyām ānamraṃ kuṭilaśaśicūḍālamukuṭam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_23'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvayā hṛtvā vāmaṃ vapur a-paritṛptena manasā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śarīrārdhaṃ śaṃbhor aparam api śaṅke hṛtam abhūt</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tathā hi tvad-rūpaṃ sa-kalam aruṇa-ābhaṃ tri-nayanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kucābhyām ānamraṃ kuṭila-śaśi-cūḍāla-mukuṭam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_24'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>jagat sūte dhātā harir avati rudraḥ kṣapayate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tiras kurvann etat svam api vapur īśas tirayati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sadāpūrvaḥ sarvaṃ tad idam anugṛhṇāti ca śivas</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tavājñām ālambya kṣanacalitayor bhrūlatikayoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_24'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>jagat sūte dhātā harir avati rudraḥ kṣapayate</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tiras kurvann etat svam api vapur īśas tirayati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sadā-pūrvaḥ sarvaṃ tad idam anugṛhṇāti ca śivas</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tavā ajñām ālambya kṣana-calitayor bhrū-latikayoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_25'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>trayāṇāṃ devānāṃ triguṇajanitānāṃ tava śive</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhavet pūjā pūjā tava caraṇayor yā viracitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hi tvatpādodvahanamaṇipīṭhasya nikaṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthitā hy ete śaśvan mukulitakarottaṃsamukuṭāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_25'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>trayāṇāṃ devānāṃ tri-guṇa-janitānāṃ tava śive</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhavet pūjā pūjā tava caraṇayor yā viracitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tathā hi tvat-pādodvahana-maṇi-pīṭhasya nikaṭe</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sthitā hy ete śaśvan mukulita-karottaṃsa-mukuṭāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_26'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>virañciḥ pañcatvaṃ vrajati harir āpnoti viratiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vināśaṃ kīnāśo bhajati dhanado yāti nidhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vitandrī māhendrī vitatir api saṃmīlitadṛśā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāsaṃhāre +asmin viharati sati tvatpatir asau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_26'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>virañciḥ pañcatvaṃ vrajati harir āpnoti viratiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vināśaṃ kīnāśo bhajati dhana-do yāti nidhanam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vi-tandrī māhendrī vitatir api saṃmīlita-dṛśā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mahā-saṃhāre +asmin viharati sati tvat-patir asau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_27'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>japo jalpaḥ śilpaṃ sakalam api mudrāviracanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gatiḥ prādakṣiṇyakramaṇam aśanādy āhutividhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇāmaḥ saṃveśaḥ sukham akhilam ātmārpaṇadṛśā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>saparyāparyāyas tava bhavatu yan me vilasitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_27'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>japo jalpaḥ śilpaṃ sa-kalam api mudrā-viracanā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>gatiḥ prādakṣiṇya-kramaṇam aśana-ādy āhuti-vidhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>praṇāmaḥ saṃveśaḥ sukham a-khilam ātmārpaṇa-dṛśā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>saparyā-paryāyas tava bhavatu yan me vilasitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_28'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dadāne dīnebhyaḥ śriyam aniśam āśānusadṛśīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>amandaṃ saundaryaprakaramakarandaṃ vikirati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tavāsmin mandārastabakasubhage yātu caraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nimajjan majjīvaḥ karaṇacaraṇaiḥ ṣa.ccaraṇatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_28'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dadāne dīnebhyaḥ śriyam aniśam āśā-anu-sa-dṛśīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>a-mandaṃ saundarya-prakara-makarandaṃ vikirati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tava asmin mandāra-stabaka-su-bhage yātu caraṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nimajjan maj-jīvaḥ karaṇa-caraṇaiḥ ṣa.c-caraṇatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_29'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sudhām apy āsvādya pratibhayajarāmṛtyuhariṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vipadyante viśve vidhiśatamakhādyā diviṣadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karālaṃ yat kṣveḍaṃ kavalitavataḥ kālakalanā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>na śaṃbhos tanmūlaṃ tava janani tāṭaṅkamahimā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_29'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sudhām apy āsvādya pratibhaya-jarā-mṛtyu-hariṇīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vipadyante viśve vidhi-śata-makha-ādyā divi-ṣadaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>karālaṃ yat kṣveḍaṃ kavalitavataḥ kāla-kalanā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>na śaṃbhos tan-mūlaṃ tava janani tāṭaṅka-mahimā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_30'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kirīṭaṃ vairiñcaṃ parihara puraḥ kaiṭabhabhidaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭhore koṭīre skhalasi jahi jambhārimukuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>praṇamreṣv eteṣu prasabham abhiyātasya bhavanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavasyābhyutthāne tava parijanoktir vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_30'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kirīṭaṃ vairiñcaṃ parihara puraḥ kaiṭabha-bhidaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kaṭhore koṭīre skhalasi jahi jambhāri-mukuṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>praṇamreṣv eteṣu prasabham abhiyātasya bhavanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhavasya abhyutthāne tava pari-janoktir vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_31'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>catuḥṣaṣṭyā tantraiḥ sakalam abhisaṃdhāya bhuvanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sthitas tattatsiddhiprasavaparatantraiḥ paśupatiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punas tvannirbandhād akhilapuruṣārthaikaghaṭanā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>svatantraṃ te tantraṃ kṣititalam avātītarad idam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_31'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>catuḥ-ṣaṣṭyā tantraiḥ sa-kalam abhisaṃdhāya bhuvanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sthitas tat-tat-siddhi-prasava-para-tantraiḥ paśu-patiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>punas tvan-nirbandhād a-khila-puruṣārtha-eka-ghaṭanā</seg><seg type='pāda'>sva-tantraṃ te tantraṃ kṣiti-talam avātītarad idam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_32'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śivaḥ śaktiḥ kāmaḥ kṣitir atha raviḥ śītakiraṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>smaro haṃsaḥ śakras tad anu ca parāmāraharayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amī hṛllekhābhis tisṛbhir avasāneṣu ghaṭitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhajante varṇās te tava janani nāmāvayavatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_32'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śivaḥ śaktiḥ kāmaḥ kṣitir atha raviḥ śīta-kiraṇaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>smaro haṃsaḥ śakras tad anu ca parā-māra-harayaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>amī hṛl-lekhābhis tisṛbhir avasāneṣu ghaṭitā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhajante varṇās te tava janani nāmāvayavatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_33'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smaraṃ yoniṃ lakṣmīṃ tritayam idam ādau tava manor</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nidhāyaike nitye niravadhimahābhogarasikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>japanti tvāṃ cintāmaṇigunanibaddhākṣavalayāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śivāgnau juhvantaḥ surabhighṛtadhārāhutiśataiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_33'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>smaraṃ yoniṃ lakṣmīṃ tritayam idam ādau tava manor</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nidhāyaike nitye nir-avadhi-mahā-bhoga-rasikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>japanti tvāṃ cintā-maṇi-guna-nibaddhākṣa-valayāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śivāgnau juhvantaḥ surabhi-ghṛta-dhāra-āhuti-śataiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_34'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śarīraṃ tvaṃ śaṃbhoḥ śaśimihiravakṣoruhayugaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tavātmānaṃ manye bhagavati bhavātmānam anagham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ataḥ śeṣaḥ śeṣīty ayam ubhayasādhāraṇatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sthitaḥ saṃbandho vāṃ samarasaparānandaparayoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_34'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śarīraṃ tvaṃ śaṃbhoḥ śaśi-mihira-vakṣo-ruha-yugaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tavā atmānaṃ manye bhagavati bhava-ātmānam an-agham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>ataḥ śeṣaḥ śeṣi īty ayam ubhaya-sādhāraṇatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sthitaḥ saṃbandho vāṃ sama-rasa-para-ānanda-parayoḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_35'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>manas tvaṃ vyoma tvaṃ marud asi marutsārathir asi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvam āpas tvaṃ bhūmis tvayi pariṇatāyāṃ na hi param</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvam eva svātmānaṃ pariṇamayituṃ viśvavapuṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>cidānandākāraṃ śivayuvati bhāvena bibhṛṣe</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_35'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>manas tvaṃ vyoma tvaṃ marud asi marut-sārathir asi</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tvam āpas tvaṃ bhūmis tvayi pariṇatāyāṃ na hi param</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvam eva sva-ātmānaṃ pariṇamayituṃ viśva-vapuṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>cid-ānanda-ākāraṃ śiva-yuvati bhāvena bibhṛṣe</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_36'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tavājñācakrasthaṃ tapanaśaśikoṭidyutidharam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>paraṃ śaṃbhuṃ vande parimilitapārśvaṃ paracitā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yam ārādhyan bhaktyā raviśaśiśucīnām aviṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirāloke loko nivasati hi bhālokabhavane</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_36'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tavā ajñā-cakra-sthaṃ tapana-śaśi-koṭi-dyuti-dharam</seg> <seg type='pāda'>paraṃ śaṃbhuṃ vande parimilita-pārśvaṃ para-citā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yam ārādhyan bhaktyā ravi-śaśi-śucīnām a-viṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nir-āloke loko nivasati hi bhā-loka-bhavane</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_37'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśuddhau te śuddhasphaṭikaviśadaṃ vyomajanakaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivaṃ seve devīm api śivasamānavyasaninīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayoḥ kāntyā yāntyā śaśikiraṇasārūpyasaraṇiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhūtāntardhvāntā vilasati cakorīva jagatī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_37'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>viśuddhau te śuddha-sphaṭika-viśadaṃ vyoma-janakaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śivaṃ seve devīm api śiva-samāna-vyasaninīm</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yayoḥ kāntyā yāntyā śaśi-kiraṇa-sārūpya-saraṇiṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vidhūtāntar-dhvāntā vilasati cakori īva jagatī</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_38'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samunmīlatsaṃvitkamalamakarandaikarasikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhaje haṃsadvaṃdvaṃ kim api mahatāṃ mānasacaram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadālāpād aṣṭādaśaguṇitavidyāpariṇatir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad ādatte doṣād guṇam akhilam adbhyaḥ paya iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_38'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>samunmīlat-saṃvit-kamala-makaranda-eka-rasikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhaje haṃsa-dvaṃdvaṃ kim api mahatāṃ mānasa-caram</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad-ālāpād aṣṭā-daśa-guṇita-vidyā-pariṇatir</seg> <seg type='pāda'>yad ādatte doṣād guṇam a-khilam adbhyaḥ paya iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_39'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava svādhiṣṭhāne hutavaham adhiṣṭhāya nirataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tam īḍe saṃvartaṃ janani mahatīṃ tāṃ ca samayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadāloke lokān dahati mahati krodhakalile</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dayārdrā dṛṣṭis te śiśiram upacāraṃ racayati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_39'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tava svādhiṣṭhāne huta-vaham adhiṣṭhāya nirataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tam īḍe saṃvartaṃ janani mahatīṃ tāṃ ca samayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad-āloke lokān dahati mahati krodha-kalile</seg> <seg type='pāda'>dayā-ārdrā dṛṣṭis te śiśiram upacāraṃ racayati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_40'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>taḍitvantaṃ śaktyā timiraparipanthisphuraṇayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sphurannānāratnābharaṇapariṇaddhendradhanuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava śyāmaṃ meghaṃ kam api maṇipūraikaśaraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>niṣeve varṣantaṃ haramihirataptaṃ tribhuvanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_40'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>taḍitvantaṃ śaktyā timira-paripanthi-sphuraṇayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sphuran-nānā-ratna-ābharaṇa-pariṇaddha-indra-dhanuṣam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tava śyāmaṃ meghaṃ kam api maṇi-pūra-eka-śaraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>niṣeve varṣantaṃ hara-mihira-taptaṃ tri-bhuvanam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_41'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tavādhāre mūle saha samayayā lāsyaparayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>navātmānaṃ vande navarasamahātāṇḍavanaṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ubhābhyām etābhyām ubhayavidhim uddiśya dayayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sanāthābhyāṃ jajñe janakajananīmad jagad idam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_41'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tavā adhāre mūle saha samayayā lāsya-parayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nava-ātmānaṃ vande nava-rasa-mahā-tāṇḍava-naṭam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>ubhābhyām etābhyām ubhaya-vidhim uddiśya dayayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sa-nāthābhyāṃ jajñe janaka-jananīmad jagad idam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_42'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatair māṇikyatvaṃ gaganamaṇibhiḥ sāndraghaṭitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kirīṭaṃ te haimaṃ himagirisute kīrtayati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>sa nīḍeyacchāyācchuraṇaśabalaṃ candraśakalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhanuḥ śaunāsīraṃ kim iti na nibadhnāti dhiṣaṇām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_42'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>gatair māṇikyatvaṃ gagana-maṇibhiḥ sāndra-ghaṭitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kirīṭaṃ te haimaṃ hima-giri-sute kīrtayati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sa nīḍeyac-chāyā-cchuraṇa-śabalaṃ candra-śakalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>dhanuḥ śaunāsīraṃ kim iti na nibadhnāti dhiṣaṇām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_43'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dhunotu dhvāntaṃ nas tulitadalitendīvaravanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ghanasnigdhaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ cikuranikurambaṃ tava śive</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadīyaṃ saurabhyaṃ sahajam upalabdhuṃ sumanaso</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vasanty asmin manye balamathanavāṭīviṭapinām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_43'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dhunotu dhvāntaṃ nas tulita-dalita-indīvara-vanaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>ghana-snigdhaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ cikura-nikurambaṃ tava śive</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yadīyaṃ saurabhyaṃ saha-jam upalabdhuṃ su-manaso</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vasanty asmin manye bala-mathana-vāṭī-viṭapinām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_44'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vahantī sundūraṃ prabalakabarībhāratimira</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>tviṣāṃ bṛndair bandīkṛtam iva navīnārkakiraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tanotu kṣemaṃ nas tava vadanasaundaryalaharī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>parīvāhasrotaḥsaraṇir iva sīmantasaraṇiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_44'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vahantī sundūraṃ pra-bala-kabarī-bhāra-timira</seg><seg type='pāda'>-tviṣāṃ bṛndair bandī-kṛtam iva navīnārka-kiraṇam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tanotu kṣemaṃ nas tava vadana-saundarya-laharī</seg><seg type='pāda'>-parīvāha-srotaḥ-saraṇir iva sīmanta-saraṇiḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_45'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arālaiḥ svābhāvyād alikalabhasaśrībhir alakaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>parītaṃ te vaktraṃ parihasati paṅkeruharucim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>darasmere yasmin daśanarucikiñjalkarucire</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sugandhau mādyanti smaramathanacakṣurmadhulihaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_45'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>arālaiḥ svābhāvyād ali-kalabha-sa-śrībhir alakaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>parītaṃ te vaktraṃ parihasati paṅke-ruha-rucim</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dara-smere yasmin daśana-ruci-kiñjalka-rucire</seg> <seg type='pāda'>su-gandhau mādyanti smara-mathana-cakṣur-madhu-lihaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_46'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>lalāṭaṃ lāvaṇyadyutivimalam ābhāti tava yad</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dvitīyaṃ tan manye mukuṭaśaśikhaṇḍasya śakalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viparyāsanyāsād ubhayam api saṃbhūya ca mithaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sudhālepasyūtiḥ pariṇamati rākāhimakaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_46'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>lalāṭaṃ lāvaṇya-dyuti-vi-malam ābhāti tava yad</seg> <seg type='pāda'>dvitīyaṃ tan manye mukuṭa-śaśi-khaṇḍasya śakalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>viparyāsa-nyāsād ubhayam api saṃbhūya ca mithaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sudhā-lepa-syūtiḥ pariṇamati rākā-hima-karaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_47'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhruvau bhugne kiṃcid bhuvanabhayabhaṅgavyasanini</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadīye netrābhyāṃ madhukararucibhyāṃ dhṛtaguṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dhanur manye savyetarakaragṛhītaṃ ratipateḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>prakoṣṭhe muṣṭau ca sthagayati nigūḍhāntaram ume</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_47'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>bhruvau bhugne kiṃ-cid bhuvana-bhaya-bhaṅga-vyasanini</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tvadīye netrābhyāṃ madhu-kara-rucibhyāṃ dhṛta-guṇe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dhanur manye savya-itara-kara-gṛhītaṃ rati-pateḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>prakoṣṭhe muṣṭau ca sthagayati nigūḍhāntaram ume</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_48'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>ahaḥ sūte savyaṃ tava nayanam arkātmakatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>triyāmāṃ vāmaṃ te sṛjati rajanīnāyakamayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tṛtīyā te dṛṣtir daradalitahemāmbujaruciḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samādhatte saṃdhyāṃ divasaniśayor antaracarīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_48'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>ahaḥ sūte savyaṃ tava nayanam arka-ātmakatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tri-yāmāṃ vāmaṃ te sṛjati rajanī-nāyakamayam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tṛtīyā te dṛṣtir dara-dalita-hemāmbu-ja-ruciḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>samādhatte saṃdhyāṃ divasa-niśayor antara-carīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_49'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>viśālā kalyāṇī sphuṭarucir ayodhyā kuvalayaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛpādhārādhārā kim api madhurā bhogavatikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>avantī dṛṣṭis te bahunagaravistāravijayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>dhruvaṃ tattannāmavyavaharaṇayogyā vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_49'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>viśālā kalyāṇī sphuṭa-rucir a-yodhyā kuvalayaiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kṛpā-dhārā-dhārā kim api madhurā bhogavatikā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>avantī dṛṣṭis te bahu-nagara-vistāra-vijayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>dhruvaṃ tat-tan-nāma-vyavaharaṇa-yogyā vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_50'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kavīnāṃ saṃdarbhastabakamakarandaikarasikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭākṣavyākṣepabhramarakalabhau karṇayugalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>amuñcantau dṛṣṭvā tava nvarasāsvādataralāv</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>asūyāsaṃsargād alikanayanaṃ kiṃcid aruṇam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_50'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kavīnāṃ saṃdarbha-stabaka-makaranda-eka-rasikaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kaṭākṣa-vyākṣepa-bhramara-kalabhau karṇa-yugalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>a-muñcantau dṛṣṭvā tava nva-rasa-āsvāda-taralāv</seg> <seg type='pāda'>asūyā-saṃsargād alika-nayanaṃ kiṃ-cid aruṇam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_51'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śive śṛṅgārārdrā taditaramukhe kutsanaparā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saroṣā gaṅgāyāṃ giriśacarite vismayavatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harāhibhyo bhītā sarasiruhasaubhāgyajayinī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sakhīṣu smerā te mayi janani dṛṣṭiḥ sakaruṇā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_51'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śive śṛṅgāra-ārdrā tad-itara-mukhe kutsana-parā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sa-roṣā gaṅgāyāṃ giri-śa-carite vismayavatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>harāhibhyo bhītā sarasi-ruha-saubhāgya-jayinī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sakhīṣu smerā te mayi janani dṛṣṭiḥ sa-karuṇā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_52'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gate karṇābhyarṇaṃ garuta iva pakṣmāṇi dadhatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>purāṃ bhettuś cittapraśamarasavidrāvaṇaphale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ime netre gotrādharapatikulottaṃsakalike</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tavā-karṇākṛṣṭasmaraśaravilāsaṃ kalayataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_52'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>gate karṇābhyarṇaṃ garuta iva pakṣmāṇi dadhatī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>purāṃ bhettuś citta-praśama-rasa-vidrāvaṇa-phale</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>ime netre gotrā-dhara-pati-kulottaṃsa-kalike</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tavā a-karṇa-ākṛṣṭa-smara-śara-vilāsaṃ kalayataḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_53'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vibhaktatraivarṇyaṃ vyatikaritanīlāñjanatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vibhāti tvannetratritayam idam īśānadayite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>punaḥ sraṣṭuṃ devān druhiṇaharirudrān uparatān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>rajaḥ sattvaṃ bibhrat tama iti guṇānāṃ trayam iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_53'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vibhakta-traivarṇyaṃ vyatikarita-nīlāñjanatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vibhāti tvan-netra-tritayam idam īśāna-dayite</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>punaḥ sraṣṭuṃ devān druhiṇa-hari-rudrān uparatān</seg> <seg type='pāda'>rajaḥ sattvaṃ bibhrat tama iti guṇānāṃ trayam iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_54'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pavitrīkartuṃ naḥ paśupatiparādhīnahṛdaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>dayāmitrair netrair aruṇadhavalaśyāmarucibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nadaḥ śoṇo gaṅgā tapanatanayeti dhruvam amuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayāṇāṃ tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam anaghe</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_54'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>pavitrī-kartuṃ naḥ paśu-pati-parādhīna-hṛdaye</seg> <seg type='pāda'>dayā-mitrair netrair aruṇa-dhavala-śyāma-rucibhiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nadaḥ śoṇo gaṅgā tapana-tanaya īti dhruvam amuṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>trayāṇāṃ tīrthānām upanayasi saṃbhedam an-aghe</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_55'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tavā-parṇe karṇejapanayanapaiśunyacakitā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nilīyante toye niyatam animeṣāḥ śapharikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>iyaṃ ca śrīr baddhacchadapuṭakapāṭaṃ kuvalayam</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jahāti pratyūṣe niśi ca vighaṭayya praviśati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_55'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tava a-parṇe karṇe-japa-nayana-paiśunya-cakitā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nilīyante toye niyatam a-nimeṣāḥ śapharikāḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>iyaṃ ca śrīr baddha-cchada-puṭa-kapāṭaṃ kuvalayam</seg> <seg type='pāda'>jahāti pratyūṣe niśi ca vighaṭayya praviśati</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_56'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nimeṣonmeṣābhyāṃ pralayam udayaṃ yāti jagatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tavety āhuḥ santo dharaṇidhararājanyatanaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadunmeṣāj jātaṃ jagad idam aśeṣaṃ pralayataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paritrātuṃ śaṅke parihṛtanimeṣās tava dṛśaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_56'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nimeṣonmeṣābhyāṃ pralayam udayaṃ yāti jagatī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tava ity āhuḥ santo dharaṇi-dhara-rājanya-tanaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvad-unmeṣāj jātaṃ jagad idam a-śeṣaṃ pralayataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>paritrātuṃ śaṅke parihṛta-nimeṣās tava dṛśaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_57'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>dṛśā drāghīyasyā daradalitanīlotpalarucā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>davīyāṃsaṃ dīnaṃ snapaya kṛpayā mām api śive</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>anenāyaṃ dhanyo bhavati na ca te hānir iyatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vane vā harmye vā samakaranipāto himakaraḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_57'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dṛśā drāghīyasyā dara-dalita-nīlotpala-rucā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>davīyāṃsaṃ dīnaṃ snapaya kṛpayā mām api śive</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>anena ayaṃ dhanyo bhavati na ca te hānir iyatā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vane vā harmye vā sama-kara-nipāto hima-karaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_58'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arālaṃ te pālīyugalam agarājanyatanaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na keṣām ādhatte kusumaśarakodaṇḍakutukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tiraścīno yatra śravaṇapatham ullaṅghya vilasan</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>apāṅgavyāsaṅgo diśati śarasaṃdhānadhiṣaṇām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_58'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>arālaṃ te pālī-yugalam a-ga-rājanya-tanaye</seg> <seg type='pāda'>na keṣām ādhatte kusuma-śara-ko-daṇḍa-kutukam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tiraś-cīno yatra śravaṇa-patham ullaṅghya vilasan</seg> <seg type='pāda'>apāṅga-vyāsaṅgo diśati śara-saṃdhāna-dhiṣaṇām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_59'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sphuradgaṇḍābhogapratiphalitatāṭaṅkayugalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>catuścakraṃ manye tava mukham idaṃ manmatharatham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yam āruhya druhyaty avaniratham arkenducaraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāvīro māraḥ pramathapataye svaṃ jitavate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_59'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sphurad-gaṇḍa-ābhoga-pratiphalita-tāṭaṅka-yugalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>catuś-cakraṃ manye tava mukham idaṃ manmatha-ratham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yam āruhya druhyaty avani-ratham arka-indu-caraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mahā-vīro māraḥ pramatha-pataye svaṃ jitavate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_60'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarasvatyāḥ sūktīr amṛtalaharīkauśalaharīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibantyāḥ śarvāṇi śravaṇaculukābhyām aviratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>camatkāraślāghācalitaśirasaḥ kuṇḍalagaṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jhaṇatkārais tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭae iva te</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_60'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sarasvatyāḥ su-uktīr a-mṛta-laharī-kauśala-harīḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>pibantyāḥ śarvāṇi śravaṇa-culukābhyām a-viratam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>camat-kāra-ślāghā-calita-śirasaḥ kuṇḍala-gaṇo</seg> <seg type='pāda'>jhaṇat-kārais tāraiḥ prativacanam ācaṣṭae iva te</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_61'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>asau nāsāvaṃśas tuhinagirivaṃśadhvajapaṭi</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvadīyo nedīyaḥ phalatu phalam asmākam ucitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vahann antar muktāḥ śiśirataraniśvāsaghaṭitāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samṛddhyā yas tāsāṃ bahir api ca muktāmaṇidharaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_61'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>asau nāsā-vaṃśas tuhina-giri-vaṃśa-dhvaja-paṭi</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tvadīyo nedīyaḥ phalatu phalam asmākam ucitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vahann antar muktāḥ śiśiratara-niśvāsa-ghaṭitāḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>samṛddhyā yas tāsāṃ bahir api ca muktā-maṇi-dharaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_62'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>prakṛtyā raktāyās tava sudati dantacchadaruceḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pravakṣye sādṛśyaṃ janayatu phalaṃ vidrumalatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>na bimbaṃ tadbimbapratiphalanalābhād aruṇitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tulām adhyāroḍhuṃ katham iva vilajjeta kalayā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_62'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>prakṛtyā raktāyās tava su-dati danta-cchada-ruceḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>pravakṣye sādṛśyaṃ janayatu phalaṃ vi-druma-latā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>na bimbaṃ tad-bimba-pratiphalana-lābhād aruṇitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tulām adhyāroḍhuṃ katham iva vilajjeta kalayā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_63'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>smitajyotsnājālaṃ tava vadanacandrasya pibatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>cakorāṇām āsīd atirasatayā cañcujaḍimā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atas te śītāṃśor amṛtalaharīm amlarucayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pibanti svacchandaṃ niśiniśi bhṛśaṃ kāñcikadhiyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_63'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>smita-jyotsnā-jālaṃ tava vadana-candrasya pibatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>cakorāṇām āsīd ati-rasatayā cañcu-jaḍimā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>atas te śītāṃśor a-mṛta-laharīm amla-rucayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>pibanti sva-cchandaṃ niśi-niśi bhṛśaṃ kāñcika-dhiyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_64'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>aviśrāntaṃ patyur guṇagaṇakathāmreḍanajapā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>japāpuṣpacchāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadagrāsīnāyāḥ sphaṭikadṛṣadacchacchavimayī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarasvatyā mūrtiḥ pariṇamati māṇikyavapuṣā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_64'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>a-viśrāntaṃ patyur guṇa-gaṇa-kathā-āmreḍana-japā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>japā-puṣpa-cchāyā tava janani jihvā jayati sā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad-agra-āsīnāyāḥ sphaṭika-dṛṣad-accha-cchavimayī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sarasvatyā mūrtiḥ pariṇamati māṇikya-vapuṣā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_65'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>raṇe jitvā daityān apahṛtaśirastraiḥ kavacibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nivṛttaiś caṇḍāṃśutripuraharanirmālyavimukhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>viśākhendropendraiḥ śaśiviśadakarpūraśakalā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vilīyante mātas tava vadanatāmbūlakabalāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_65'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>raṇe jitvā daityān apahṛta-śiras-traiḥ kavacibhir</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nivṛttaiś caṇḍāṃśu-tri-pura-hara-nirmālya-vi-mukhaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>viśākha-indropa-indraiḥ śaśi-viśada-karpūra-śakalā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vilīyante mātas tava vadana-tāmbūla-kabalāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_66'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vipañcyā gāyantī vividham avadānaṃ paśupates</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tvayārabdhe vaktuṃ calitaśirasā sādhuvacane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadīyair mādhuryair apalapitatantrīkalaravāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nijāṃ vīṇāṃ vāṇī niculayati colena nibhṛtam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_66'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vipañcyā gāyantī vividham avadānaṃ paśu-pates</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tvayā ārabdhe vaktuṃ calita-śirasā sādhu-vacane</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvadīyair mādhuryair apalapita-tantrī-kala-ravāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nijāṃ vīṇāṃ vāṇī niculayati colena nibhṛtam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_67'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karāgreṇa spaṣṭaṃ tuhinagiriṇā vatsalatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>girīśenodastaṃ muhur adharapānākulatayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>karagrāhyaṃ śaṃbhor mukhamukuravṛntaṃ girisute</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kathaṃkāraṃ brūmas tava cibukam aupamyarahitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_67'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>karāgreṇa spaṣṭaṃ tuhina-giriṇā vatsalatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>giri-īśena udastaṃ muhur adhara-pāna-ākulatayā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kara-grāhyaṃ śaṃbhor mukha-mukura-vṛntaṃ giri-sute</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kathaṃ-kāraṃ brūmas tava cibukam aupamya-rahitam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_68'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>bhujāśleṣān nityaṃ puradamayituḥ kaṇṭakavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tava grīvā dhatte mukhakamalanālaśriyam iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svataḥ śvetā kālāgarubahalajambālamalinā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mṛṇālīlālityam vahati yadadho hāralatikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_68'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>bhuja-āśleṣān nityaṃ pura-damayituḥ kaṇṭakavatī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tava grīvā dhatte mukha-kamala-nāla-śriyam iyam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>svataḥ śvetā kāla āgaru-bahala-jambāla-malinā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mṛṇālī-lālityam vahati yad-adho hāra-latikā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_69'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gale rekhās tisro gatigamakagītaikanipuṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>vivāhavyānaddhatriguṇaguṇasaṃkhyāpratibhuvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>virājante nānāvidhamadhurarāgākarabhuvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ sthitiniyamasīmāna iva te</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_69'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>gale rekhās tisro gati-gamaka-gīta-eka-nipuṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vivāha-vyānaddha-tri-guṇa-guṇa-saṃkhyā-pratibhuvaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>virājante nānā-vidha-madhura-rāga-ākara-bhuvāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>trayāṇāṃ grāmāṇāṃ sthiti-niyama-sīmāna iva te</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_70'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṇālīmṛdvīnāṃ tava bhujalatānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>caturbhiḥ saundaryaṃ sarasijabhavaḥ stauti vadanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>nakhebhyaḥ saṃtrasyan prathamamathanād andhakaripoś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>caturṇāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ samam abhayahastārpaṇadhiyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_70'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mṛṇālī-mṛdvīnāṃ tava bhuja-latānāṃ catasṛṇāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>caturbhiḥ saundaryaṃ sarasi-ja-bhavaḥ stauti vadanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nakhebhyaḥ saṃtrasyan prathama-mathanād andhaka-ripoś</seg> <seg type='pāda'>caturṇāṃ śīrṣāṇāṃ samam a-bhaya-hastārpaṇa-dhiyā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_71'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nakhānām uddyotair navanalinarāgaṃ vihasatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>karāṇāṃ te kāntiṃ kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kayā cid vā sāmyaṃ bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yadi krīḍallakṣmīcaraṇatalalākṣāruṇadalam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_71'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nakhānām uddyotair nava-nalina-rāgaṃ vihasatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>karāṇāṃ te kāntiṃ kathaya kathayāmaḥ katham ume</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kayā cid vā sāmyaṃ bhajatu kalayā hanta kamalaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>yadi krīḍal-lakṣmī-caraṇa-tala-lākṣā-aruṇa-dalam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_72'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samaṃ devi skandadvipavadanapītaṃ stanayugaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tavedaṃ naḥ khedaṃ haratu satataṃ prasnutamukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yad ālokyāśaṅkākulitahṛdayo hāsajanakaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>svakumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_72'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>samaṃ devi skanda-dvi-pa-vadana-pītaṃ stana-yugaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tava idaṃ naḥ khedaṃ haratu satataṃ prasnuta-mukham</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad ālokyā aśaṅka-ākulita-hṛdayo hāsa-janakaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sva-kumbhau herambaḥ parimṛśati hastena jhaṭiti</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_73'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>amū te vakṣojāv amṛtarasamāṇikyakutupau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>na saṃdehaspando nagapatipatāke manasi naḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>pibantau tau yasmād aviditavadhūsaṃgamarasau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kumārāv adyāpi dviradavadanakrauñcadalanau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_73'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>amū te vakṣo-jāv a-mṛta-rasa-māṇikya-kutupau</seg> <seg type='pāda'>na saṃdeha-spando naga-pati-patāke manasi naḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>pibantau tau yasmād a-vidita-vadhū-saṃgama-rasau</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kumārāv adya api dvir-ada-vadana-krauñca-dalanau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_74'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>vahaty amba stamberamadanujakumbhaprakṛtibhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>samārabdhāṃ muktāmaṇibhir amalāṃ hāralatikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kucābhogo bimbādhararucibhir antaḥ śabalitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>pratāpavyāmiśrāṃ puravijayinaḥ kīrtim iva te</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_74'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vahaty amba stambe-rama-danu-ja-kumbha-prakṛtibhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>samārabdhāṃ muktā-maṇibhir a-malāṃ hāra-latikām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kuca-ābhogo bimbādhara-rucibhir antaḥ śabalitāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>pratāpa-vyāmiśrāṃ pura-vijayinaḥ kīrtim iva te</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_75'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>tava stanyaṃ manye dharaṇidharakanye hṛdayataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>payaḥpārāvāraḥ parivahati sārasvata iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dayāvatyā dattaṃ draviḍaśiśur āsvādya tava yat</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kavīnāṃ prauḍhānām ajani kamaniyaḥ kavayitā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_75'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tava stanyaṃ manye dharaṇi-dhara-kanye hṛdayataḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>payaḥ-pārāvāraḥ parivahati sārasvata iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dayāvatyā dattaṃ draviḍa-śiśur āsvādya tava yat</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kavīnāṃ prauḍhānām ajani kamaniyaḥ kavayitā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_76'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>harakrodhajvālāvalibhir avalīḍhena vapuṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>gabhīre te nābhīsarasi kṛtasaṅgo manasijaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>samuttasthau tasmād acalatanaye dhūmalatikā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>janas tāṃ jānīte janani tava romāvalir iti</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_76'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>hara-krodha-jvālāvalibhir avalīḍhena vapuṣā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>gabhīre te nābhī-sarasi kṛta-saṅgo manasi-jaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>samuttasthau tasmād a-cala-tanaye dhūma-latikā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>janas tāṃ jānīte janani tava romāvalir iti</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_77'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>yad etat kālindītanutarataraṅgākṛti śive</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kṛśe madhye kiṃ cij janani tava tad bhāti sudhiyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>vimardād anyoanyaṃ kucakalaśayor antaragataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tanūbhūtaṃ vyoma praviśad iva nābhīkuhariṇīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_77'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad etat kālindī-tanutara-taraṅga-ākṛti śive</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kṛśe madhye kiṃ cij janani tava tad bhāti su-dhiyām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>vimardād anyo-anyaṃ kuca-kalaśayor antara-gataṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tanū-bhūtaṃ vyoma praviśad iva nābhī-kuhariṇīm</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_78'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sthiro gaṅgāvartaḥ stanamukularomāvalilatā</seg><seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalāvālaṃ kuṇḍaṃ kusumaśaratejohutabhujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>rater līlāgāraṃ kim api tava nābhīti girije</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>biladvāraṃ siddher giriśanayanānāṃ vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_78'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sthiro gaṅgā-āvartaḥ stana-mukula-roma-āvali-latā</seg><seg type='pāda'>kalā-āvālaṃ kuṇḍaṃ kusuma-śara-tejo-huta-bhujaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>rater līlā-agāraṃ kim api tava nābhi īti giri-je</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bila-dvāraṃ siddher giri-śa-nayanānāṃ vijayate</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_79'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nisargakṣīṇasya stanataṭabhareṇa klamajuṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>namanmūrter nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyatae iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ te madhyasya truṭitataṭinītīrataruṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>samāvasthāsthemno bhavatu kuśalaṃ śailatanaye</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_79'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nisarga-kṣīṇasya stana-taṭa-bhareṇa klama-juṣo</seg> <seg type='pāda'>naman-mūrter nābhau baliṣu śanakais truṭyatae iva</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>ciraṃ te madhyasya truṭita-taṭinī-tīra-taruṇā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>samāvasthā-sthemno bhavatu kuśalaṃ śaila-tanaye</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_80'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kucau sadyaḥ svidyattaṭaghaṭitakūrpāsabhidurau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṣantau dormūle kanakakalaśābhau kalayatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tava trātuṃ bhaṅgād alam iti vilagnaṃ tanubhuvā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tridhā naddhaṃ devi trivali lavalīvallibhir iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_80'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kucau sadyaḥ svidyat-taṭa-ghaṭita-kūrpāsa-bhidurau</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kaṣantau dor-mūle kanaka-kalaśa-ābhau kalayatā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tava trātuṃ bhaṅgād alam iti vilagnaṃ tanu-bhuvā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tridhā naddhaṃ devi tri-vali lavalī-vallibhir iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_81'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gurutvaṃ vistāraṃ kṣitidharapatiḥ pārvati nijān</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nitambād ācchidya tvayi haraṇarūpeṇa nidadhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atas te vistīrṇo gurur ayam aśeṣāṃ vasumatīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nitambaprāgbhāraḥ sthagayati laghutvaṃ nayati ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_81'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>gurutvaṃ vistāraṃ kṣiti-dhara-patiḥ pārvati nijān</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nitambād ācchidya tvayi haraṇa-rūpeṇa nidadhe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>atas te vistīrṇo gurur ayam a-śeṣāṃ vasumatīṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nitamba-prāg-bhāraḥ sthagayati laghutvaṃ nayati ca</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_82'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>karīndrāṇāṃ śuṇḍāḥ kanakakadalīkāṇḍapaṭalīm</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvṛttābhyāṃ patyuḥ praṇatikaṭhinābhyāṃ girisute</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vijigye jānubhyāṃ vibudhakarikumbhadvayam api</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_82'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kari-indrāṇāṃ śuṇḍāḥ kanaka-kadalī-kāṇḍa-paṭalīm</seg> <seg type='pāda'>ubhābhyām ūrubhyām ubhayam api nirjitya bhavatī</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>su-vṛttābhyāṃ patyuḥ praṇati-kaṭhinābhyāṃ giri-sute</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vijigye jānubhyāṃ vibudha-kari-kumbha-dvayam api</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_83'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>parājetuṃ rudraṃ dviguṇaśaragarbhau girisute</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te viṣamaviśikho bāḍham akṛta</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yadagre dṛśyante daśaśaraphalāḥ pādayugalī</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>nakhāgracchadmānaḥ suramukuṭaśāṇaikaniśitāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_83'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>parājetuṃ rudraṃ- dvi-guṇa-śara-garbhau giri-sute</seg> <seg type='pāda'>niṣaṅgau jaṅghe te vi-ṣama-viśikho bāḍham akṛta</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yad-agre dṛśyante daśa-śara-phalāḥ pāda-yugalī</seg><seg type='pāda'>-nakhāgra-cchadmānaḥ sura-mukuṭa-śāṇa-eka-niśitāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_84'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>śrutīnāṃ mūrdhāno dadhati tava yau śekharatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>mamāpy etau mātaḥ śirasi dayayā dhehi caraṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>yayoḥ pādyaṃ pāthaḥ paśupatijaṭājūṭataṭinī</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yayor lākṣālakṣmīr aruṇaharicūḍāmaṇiruciḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_84'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>śrutīnāṃ mūrdhāno dadhati tava yau śekharatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mama apy etau mātaḥ śirasi dayayā dhehi caraṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>yayoḥ pādyaṃ pāthaḥ paśu-pati-jaṭā-jūṭa-taṭinī</seg> <seg type='pāda'>yayor lākṣā-lakṣmīr aruṇa-hari-cūḍā-maṇi-ruciḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_85'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>namovākaṃ brūmo nayanaramaṇīyāya padayos</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tavāsmai dvandvāya sphuṭarucirasālaktakavate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>asūyaty atyantaṃ yad abhihananāya spṛhayate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>paśūnām īśānaḥ pramadavanakaṅkelitarave</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_85'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>namo-vākaṃ brūmo nayana-ramaṇīyāya padayos</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tava asmai dvandvāya sphuṭa-ruci-rasa-ālaktakavate</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>asūyaty aty-antaṃ yad abhihananāya spṛhayate</seg> <seg type='pāda'>paśūnām īśānaḥ pramada-vana-kaṅkeli-tarave</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_86'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>mṛṣā kṛtvā gotraskhalanam atha vailakṣyanamitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>lalāṭe bhartāraṃ caraṇakamale tāḍayati te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>cirād antaḥśalyaṃ dahanakṛtam unmūlitavatā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tulākoṭikvāṇaiḥ kilikilitam īśānaripuṇā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_86'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mṛṣā kṛtvā gotra-skhalanam atha vailakṣya-namitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>lalāṭe bhartāraṃ caraṇa-kamale tāḍayati te</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>cirād antaḥ-śalyaṃ- dahana-kṛtam unmūlitavatā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tulā-koṭi-kvāṇaiḥ kilikilitam īśāna-ripuṇā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_87'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>himānīhantavyaṃ himagiritaṭākrānticaturau</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niśāyāṃ nidrāṇāṃ niśi ca parabhāge ca viśadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>paraṃ lakṣmīpātraṃ śriyam atisṛjantau samayināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>sarojaṃ tvatpādau janani jayataś citram iha kim</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_87'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>himānī-hantavyaṃ hima-giri-taṭa-ākrānti-caturau</seg> <seg type='pāda'>niśāyāṃ nidrāṇāṃ niśi ca para-bhāge ca viśadau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>paraṃ lakṣmī-pātraṃ śriyam atisṛjantau samayināṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>saro-jaṃ tvat-pādau janani jayataś citram iha kim</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_88'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padaṃ te kāntīnāṃ prapadam apadaṃ devi vipadāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kathaṃ nītaṃ sadbhiḥ kaṭhinakamaṭhīkarparatulām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kathaṃ vā bāhubhyām upayamanakāle purabhidā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad ādāya nyastaṃ dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_88'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>padaṃ te kāntīnāṃ pra-padam a-padaṃ devi vipadāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kathaṃ nītaṃ sadbhiḥ kaṭhina-kamaṭhī-karpara-tulām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kathaṃ vā bāhubhyām upayamana-kāle pura-bhidā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>yad ādāya nyastaṃ dṛṣadi dayamānena manasā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_89'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nakhair nākastrīṇāṃ karakamalasaṃkocaśaśibhis</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>tarūṇāṃ divyānāṃ hasata iva te caṇḍi caraṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>phalāni svasthebhyaḥ kisalayakarāgreṇa dadatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>daridrebhyo bhadrāṃ śriyam aniśam ahnāya dadatau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_89'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nakhair nāka-strīṇāṃ kara-kamala-saṃkoca-śaśibhis</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tarūṇāṃ divyānāṃ hasata iva te caṇḍi caraṇau</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>phalāni sva-sthebhyaḥ kisalaya-karāgreṇa dadatāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>daridrebhyo bhadrāṃ śriyam a-niśam ahnāya dadatau</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_90'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kadā kāle mātaḥ kathaya kalitālaktakarasaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>pibeyaṃ vidyārthī tava caraṇanirṇejanajalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>prakṛtyā mūkānām api ca kavitākāraṇatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>yad ādhatte vāṇīmukhakamalatāmbūlarasatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_90'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kadā kāle mātaḥ kathaya kalitālaktaka-rasaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>pibeyaṃ vidyā-arthī tava caraṇa-nirṇejana-jalam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>prakṛtyā mūkānām api ca kavitā-kāraṇatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>yad ādhatte vāṇī-mukha-kamala-tāmbūla-rasatām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_91'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>padanyāsakrīḍāparicayam ivārabdhumanasaś</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>carantas te khelaṃ bhavanakalahaṃsā na jahati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>suvikṣepe śikṣāṃ subhagamaṇimañjīraraṇita</seg><seg type='pāda' n='d'>cchalād ācakṣāṇaṃ caraṇakamalaṃ cārucarite</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_91'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>pada-nyāsa-krīḍā-paricayam ivā arabdhu-manasaś</seg> <seg type='pāda'>carantas te khelaṃ bhavana-kala-haṃsā na jahati</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>su-vikṣepe śikṣāṃ su-bhaga-maṇi-mañjīra-raṇita</seg><seg type='pāda'>-cchalād ācakṣāṇaṃ caraṇa-kamalaṃ cāru-carite</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_92'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>arālā keśeṣu prakṛtisaralā mandahasite</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śirīṣābhā citte dṛṣad iva kaṭhorā kucataṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>bhṛśaṃ tanvī madhye pṛthur urasijārohaviṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>jagat trātuṃ śaṃbhor jayati karuṇā kā cid aruṇā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_92'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>arālā keśeṣu prakṛti-saralā manda-hasite</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śirīṣa-ābhā citte dṛṣad iva kaṭhorā kuca-taṭe</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>bhṛśaṃ tanvī madhye pṛthur urasi-ja-āroha-viṣaye</seg> <seg type='pāda'>jagat trātuṃ śaṃbhor jayati karuṇā kā cid aruṇā</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_93'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>purārāter antaḥpuram asi tatas tvaccaraṇayoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>saparyāmaryādā taralakaraṇānām asulabhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tathā hy ete nītāḥ śatamakhamukhāḥ siddhim atulāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tava dvāropāntasthitibhir aṇimādyābhir amarāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_93'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>purārāter antaḥ-puram asi tatas tvac-caraṇayoḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>saparyā-maryādā tarala-karaṇānām a-su-labhā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tathā hy ete nītāḥ śata-makha-mukhāḥ siddhim a-tulāṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tava dvāropānta-sthitibhir aṇimā-ādyābhir a-marāḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_94'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>gatās te mañcatvaṃ druhiṇaharirudreśvarabhṛtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śivaḥ svacchacchāyāghaṭitakapaṭapracchadapaṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>tvadīyānāṃ bhāsāṃ pratiphalanalābhāruṇatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>śarīrī śṛṅgāro rasa iva dṛśāṃ dogdhi kutukam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_94'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>gatās te mañcatvaṃ druhiṇa-hari-rudra-īśvara-bhṛtaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śivaḥ svaccha-cchāyā-ghaṭita-kapaṭa-pracchada-paṭaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>tvadīyānāṃ bhāsāṃ pratiphalana-lābhāruṇatayā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śarīrī śṛṅgāro rasa iva dṛśāṃ dogdhi kutukam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_95'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalaṅkaḥ kastūrī rajanikarabimbaṃ jalamayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kalābhiḥ karpūrair marakatakaraṇḍaṃ nibiḍitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>atas tvadbhogena pratidinam idaṃ riktakuharaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>vidhir bhūyobhūyo nibiḍayati nūnaṃ tava kṛte</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_95'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kalaṅkaḥ kastūrī rajani-kara-bimbaṃ jalamayaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kalābhiḥ karpūrair marakata-karaṇḍaṃ nibiḍitam</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>atas tvad-bhogena prati-dinam idaṃ rikta-kuharaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>vidhir bhūyo-bhūyo nibiḍayati nūnaṃ tava kṛte</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_96'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>svadehodbhūtābhir ghṛṇibhir aṇimādyābhir abhito</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>niṣevye nitye tvām aham iti sadā bhāvayati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>kim āścaryaṃ tasya trinayansamṛddhiṃ tṛṇayato</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāsaṃvartāgnir viracayati nīrājanavidhim</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_96'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sva-dehodbhūtābhir ghṛṇibhir aṇimā-ādyābhir abhito</seg> <seg type='pāda'>niṣevye nitye tvām aham iti sadā bhāvayati yaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kim āścaryaṃ tasya tri-nayan-samṛddhiṃ tṛṇayato</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mahā-saṃvartāgnir viracayati nīrājana-vidhim</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_97'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>kalatraṃ vaidhātraṃ katikati bhajante na kavayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>śriyo devyāḥ ko vā na bhavati patiḥ kair api dhanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>mahādevaṃ hitvā tava sati satīnām acarame</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravakataror apy asulabhaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_97'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>kalatraṃ vaidhātraṃ kati-kati bhajante na kavayaḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>śriyo devyāḥ ko vā na bhavati patiḥ kair api dhanaiḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>mahā-devaṃ hitvā tava sati satīnām a-carame</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kucābhyām āsaṅgaḥ kuravaka-taror apy a-su-labhaḥ</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_98'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>girām āhur devīṃ druhiṇagṛhiṇīm āgamavido</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>hareḥ patnīṃ padmāṃ harasahacārīm adritanayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>turīyā kāpi tvaṃ duradhigamaniḥsīmamahimā</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>mahāmāye viśvaṃ bhramayasi parabrahmamahiṣi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_98'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>girām āhur devīṃ druhiṇa-gṛhiṇīm āgama-vido</seg> <seg type='pāda'>hareḥ patnīṃ padmāṃ hara-saha-cārīm adri-tanayām</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>turīyā ka āpi tvaṃ dur-adhigama-niḥ-sīma-mahimā</seg> <seg type='pāda'>mahā-māye viśvaṃ bhramayasi para-brahma-mahiṣi</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_99'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>sarasvatyā lakṣmyā vidhiharisapatno viharate</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>rateḥ pātivratyaṃ śithilayati ramyeṇa vapuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>ciraṃ jīvann eṣa kṣapitapaśupāśavyatikaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>parabrahmābhikhyaṃ rasayati rasaṃ tvadbhajanavān</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_99'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>sarasvatyā lakṣmyā vidhi-hari-sa-patno viharate</seg> <seg type='pāda'>rateḥ pātivratyaṃ śithilayati ramyeṇa vapuṣā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>ciraṃ jīvann eṣa kṣapita-paśu-pāśa-vyatikaraḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>para-brahmābhikhyaṃ rasayati rasaṃ tvad-bhajanavān</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_100'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>pradīpajvālābhir divasakaranīrājanavidhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>sudhāsūteś candropalajalalavair arghyaghaṭanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>svakīyair ambhobhiḥ salilanidhisauhityakaraṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>tvadīyābhir vāgbhis tava janani vācāṃ stutir iyam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_100'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>pradīpa-jvālābhir divasa-kara-nīrājana-vidhiḥ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>sudhā-sūteś candropala-jala-lavair arghya-ghaṭanā</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>svakīyair ambhobhiḥ salila-nidhi-sauhitya-karaṇaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>tvadīyābhir vāgbhis tava janani vācāṃ stutir iyam</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_101'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samānītaḥ padbhyāṃ maṇimukuratām ambaramaṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>bhayād antarbaddhastimitakiraṇaśreṇimasṛṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>dadhāti tvadvaktraṃ pratiphalitam aśrāntivikacaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirātaṅkaṃ candrān nijahṛdayapaṅkeruham iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_101'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>samānītaḥ padbhyāṃ maṇi-mukuratām ambara-maṇir</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhayād antar-baddha-stimita-kiraṇa-śreṇi-masṛṇaḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>dadhāti tvad-vaktraṃ pratiphalitam a-śrānti-vikacaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nir-ātaṅkaṃ candrān nija-hṛdaya-paṅke-ruham iva</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_102'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>samudbhūtasthūlastanabharam uraś cāru hasitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>kaṭākṣe kandarpaḥ kusumitakadambadyutivapuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>harasya tvadbhrāntiṃ manasi janayām āsa madano</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>bhavatyā ye bhaktāḥ pariṇatir amīṣām iyam ume</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_102'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>samudbhūta-sthūla-stana-bharam uraś cāru hasitaṃ</seg> <seg type='pāda'>kaṭākṣe kandarpaḥ kusumita-kadamba-dyuti-vapuḥ</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>harasya tvad-bhrāntiṃ manasi janayām āsa madano</seg> <seg type='pāda'>bhavatyā ye bhaktāḥ pariṇatir amīṣām iyam ume</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

<lg xml:id='Saul_103'>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='a'>nidhe nityasmere niravadhiguṇe nītinipuṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='b'>nirāghātajñāne niyamaparacittaikanilaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda' n='c'>niyatyā nirmukte nikhilanigamāntastutipade</seg> <seg type='pāda' n='d'>nirātaṅke nitye nigamaya mamāpi stutim imām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
<note type='analysis' corresp='#Saul_103'>
<lg>
<l><seg type='pāda'>nidhe nitya-smere nir-avadhi-guṇe nīti-nipuṇe</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nirāghāta-jñāne niyama-paracitta-eka-nilaye</seg> </l>
<l><seg type='pāda'>niyatyā nirmukte nikhila-nigamānta-stuti-pade</seg> <seg type='pāda'>nir-ātaṅke nitye nigamaya mama api stutim imām</seg> //</l>
</lg>
</note>

  </body>
